description: Additional configuration for sending an alert to Splunk.

HECURL.description: The HTTP event collector (HEC) URL to send the alert to.

certificateAuthority.description: If set, will use this as the CA for TLS communication.

insecureSkipVerify.description: If true, will attempt to skip TLS verification when communicating.

token.description: The token to communicate with the HTTP event collector.
